title: Quince and cranberry chutney
ingredients: ['400g granulated sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '500ml water', '450g quinces - peeled, cored and diced', '1 orange, zested (optional)', '120ml orange juice', '2 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '325g fresh or frozen cranberries']
